_field_tag_reference_64.name: type^
_field_tag_reference_64.validtags: ligh, gldf, ltvl, effe, lsnd, lens, cpem, egfd, decs

_field_tag_reference_64.name: override type#this attachment will override the attachment on the object that shares this
_field_tag_reference_64.validtags: ligh, gldf, ltvl, effe, lsnd, lens, cpem, egfd, decs

item.Name: none
primary
secondary
tertiary
quaternary
force always on#when this flag is clear we only create the attachment when the function object function is active or set to empty string
effect size scale from object scale

plugin._field_explanation: Used for damage reporting - we want to know what attachments something has when it deals damage

_field_real.name: accuracy spread{Accuracy Bloom}:percent
precision transition in time modifier:percent
precision transition out time modifier:percent
move speed scale modifier:percent
turn rate scale modifier:percent
simulated input scale modifier:percent
autoaim angle:percent#the maximum angle that autoaim works at full strength
prioritization angle:percent#angle used to select model targets based on priority
autoaim range:percent#autoaim only has an effect along this distance
autoaim falloff range:percent#at what point the autoaim starts falling off. Fully falls off at autoaim range.
autoaim near falloff range:percent#at what point the autoaim reaches full power
magnetism angle:percent#at what point the autoaim reaches full power
magnetism range:percent#magnetism only has an effect along this distance
magnetism falloff range:percent#at what point magnetism starts falling off. Fully falls off at magnetism range.
magnetism near falloff range:percent#at what point magnetism reaches full power
deviation angle:percent#the maximum angle that a projectile is allowed to deviate from the gun barrel due to autoaim OR network lead vector reconstruction
view kick deceleration modifier:percent
view kick return to center modifier:percent
gunkick spring constant modifier:percent
ready playback speed modifier:percent
ready initial playback modifier:percent
put away playback speed modifier:percent
reload playback speed modifier:percent
reload while empty playback speed modifier:percent
heat loss per second modifier:percent
overheated heat loss per second modifier:percent
heat generated per round modifier:percent

_field_string_id.name: display name#friendly name for the item
help text#verbose usage info for use during gameplay
icon string id#legacy, from when we embedded the sprites into the font to get streaming behaviour

_field_long_integer.name: sprite index#frame inside the item's image strip which shows this item

_field_tag_reference_64.name: alt sprite#secondary bitmap file representing this item. for detail images, overlays etc.

item.Name: not hide ui reticle#Prevents hiding the ui reticle when in ADS
aim assist ADS only#only enable aim assist when aimed down sight
aim assist magnetism ADS only#only enable aim assist magnetism when aimed down sight
hide weapon in ADS#weapon will become hidden when the targeting computer (tc) transition begins

_field_custom.name: ads transition in time{precision aim transition in time}#time in seconds to transition into precision aim mode

_field_struct.name: ads transition in time{precision aim transition in time}#time in seconds to transition into precision aim mode

_field_real.name: Base Value

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base

_field_custom.name: ads transition out time{precision aim transition out time}#time in seconds to transition out of precision aim mode

_field_struct.name: ads transition out time{precision aim transition out time}#time in seconds to transition out of precision aim mode

_field_real.name: Base Value

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base

_field_real.name: weapon fov scale

_field_real_point_3d.name: ads translation offset{precision aim translation offset}

plugin._field_explanation: maps the transiton time to the offset percent

_field_real_fraction.name: ads state enabled fraction#progress along ads transition to enable ads state

plugin._field_explanation: maps the post ads enabled fraction to the end of the ads transition

_field_real_fraction.name: transparency transition start ads fraction#sight's transparent parts will start transitioning towards maximum transparency at this point of the ads transition
transparency transition finish ads fraction#sight's transparent parts will reach maximum transparency at this point of the ads transition

plugin._field_explanation: The player won't be able to enter ADS again until fully transitioned out of ADS.

_field_real.name: penalized descope transition out modifier:percent#modifies precision aim transition out time. Default value 0.9.
penalized descope ADS hold disable time:seconds#Time for the weapon to ads reenter ads when continuously holding the ADS button. Default value 0.8

_field_real_fraction.name: ADS camo removal scale{ADS camo distortion subtraction}#Scales weapon active camo when aimed in

_field_real.name: magnification
zoom transition time
effect rate

item.Name: overrides unit and camera screen effects

move speed scale modifier:percent

simulated input scale modifier:percent

prioritization angle:percent#angle used to select model targets based on priority
autoaim range:percent#autoaim only has an effect along this distance
autoaim falloff range:percent#at what point the autoaim starts falling off. Fully falls off at autoaim range.
autoaim near falloff range:percent#at what point the autoaim reaches full power
magnetism angle:percent#at what point the autoaim reaches full power
magnetism range:percent#magnetism only has an effect along this distance
magnetism falloff range:percent#at what point magnetism starts falling off. Fully falls off at magnetism range.

deviation angle:percent#the maximum angle that a projectile is allowed to deviate from the gun barrel due to autoaim OR network lead vector reconstruction
